title: Remove remaining Smart Janghai text branding and ensure non-text logo fallback

requirements.summary: Remove visible “SMART JANGHAI” / “Smart Janghai” branding text so branding is logo-only in hero and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: The hero branding area does not display any brand-name text (only the logo image is shown).
The footer does not display the brand name text (e.g., remove/replace the “© {year} Smart Janghai. All rights reserved.” wording so it no longer contains the brand name).
No other new user-facing text is introduced as a substitute for the removed brand-name text.

file_operations.description: Remove the brand-name text from the footer copyright line while keeping the rest of the footer content unchanged (no new substitute brand text).

Remove/avoid any user-visible brand-name text in the hero branding area by ensuring hero image alt text does not contain the brand name (so broken-image fallback text never shows the brand). Also remove the visible brand-name words from the CTA title without introducing new substitute text.

requirements.summary: Update BrandLogo so image load failure uses a non-text placeholder fallback that preserves layout.
acceptanceCriteria: If the logo image path is invalid or the image fails to load, the component renders a simple non-text placeholder (e.g., a neutral shape/container) and the page remains fully rendered.
The fallback does not contain “SMART JANGHAI” or “Smart Janghai” text.

file_operations.description: Replace the current text fallback with a non-text visual placeholder (e.g., neutral rounded container/skeleton) that matches the selected size height to preserve layout and maintains the resilient image-loading behavior; also ensure the rendered image metadata (alt/labels) does not include the brand name to avoid showing it on image failure.
